General.Name: Solueta Co Ltd
General.Description: Solueta Co., Ltd. provides electromagnetic wave shielding materials in Korea and internationally. The company offers nano powder, alloy materials, graphitic carbon layers, and carbon coated nickel nano powder. Its products are used in various applications, such as mobile, display, automobile, medical device, and specs. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
